name: MegaCampus
overview:
MegaCampus is a social educational platform. You can learn something new, advance certain skillsets you already possess, teach something, or just socialize! Share your skills and knowledge with the world. Teach Something, Get Hired, Get Educated, and Get Paid!

MegaCampus provides you with a one stop shop for all your education, networking, job search, and social experience needs. With MegaCampus you can easily discover the skills that exist in your personal network. You can see what your friends and colleagues are working on, interact with them, give feedback or praise for their efforts.

Most importantly MegaCampus provides the ability to learn anything your heart desires and teach anything you want to share with the world. What you do with MegaCampus is up to you, but you will always leave with a little more knowledge of something or someone then you initially had
